name: Sven but with an F
description:
Controls:

WASD: Move

Shift: Enable Sledding

Space 2x : Double Jump

Story :

A dutch traveler by the name of Sven vengures to the top of the Swedish mountain, Kebnekaise, with his chonky dog, Fred. What he did not expect with his calm vacation was the horde of zombies lurking around each corner and on top of that. The evil Zombie Overlord Gunther welcomes you to the mountain and proceeds to steal your chonky dog Fred.

You have to save Fred.

Credits:

Joeri van Alphen : Developer / Level Designer

Christian Seehuusen : Developer /  Voice Actor

Ryan Blazer : Developer / Player Controls

Alexandra Söderström : Artist / Animation's
